text: NGC 2164 is a 10th-magnitude open cluster in the Dorado constellation. The celestial object was discovered on September 27, 1826, by the Scottish astronomer James Dunlop. Its apparent size is 2.5 arcmin. It is located in the LMC. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Open clusters Category:ESO objects 2164 Category:Large Magellanic Cloud Category:Dorado (constellation) Category:Astronomical objects discovered in 1826
title: NGC 2164
